item.description:
Good news Everyone!

 

We had a poll for the May book and you guys chose Zoo City by Lauren Beukes.


From the Amazon synopsis:

Zinzi has a Sloth on her back, a dirty online 419 scam habit – and a talent for finding lost things. But when her latest client, a little old lady, turns up dead and the cops confiscate her lastpaycheck, she’s forced to take on her least favourite kind of job: missing persons

 

We will be meeting at Comicazi on Highland Ave in Davis Square. There is metered parking all along Highland as well as a public lot on Day Street near Redbones. There is also T access and bus connections.

 

See you there!  
-Josh
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of nerds in a comic shop. Shouldn't be hard, right?
item.name: May Book Club Meeting
